titleStmt.title: Tvvo sermons preached: one before the Right Honorable House of Lords, on their publick fast, May 26. 1647. The other, before the Honorable House of Commons, on their publick fast, in Margarets Church in Westminster, Septemb. 29. 1647. / By Thomas Valentine one of the Assembly of Divines, and minister in Chalfort in the county of Bucks.
titleStmt.author: Valentine, Thomas, 1585 or 6-1665?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M S. for John Rothwell at the Sun and Fountain in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Consists only of the sermon preached before the House of Commons on Sept. 29, 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
